name: CPApplicationDelegate
desc: The interface for handling CarPlay life-cycle events.

items.name: func application(UIApplication, didConnectCarInterfaceController: CPInterfaceController, to: CPWindow)
items.desc: Tells the app delegate that the app connected to the CarPlay interface.

items.name: func application(UIApplication, didDisconnectCarInterfaceController: CPInterfaceController, from: CPWindow)
items.desc: Tells the app delegate that the app disconnected from the CarPlay interface.

items.name: func application(UIApplication, didSelect: CPManeuver)
items.desc: Tells the app delegate that the user selected a maneuver.

items.name: func application(UIApplication, didSelect: CPNavigationAlert)
items.desc: Tells the app delegate that the user selected an action from a navigation alert.
